text: this great movement of people has many
faces but few I've met that are as
luminous as the vulnerable and
extraordinary teenager I met on the
border wondering where she and her
sister would go next
no genus 16 and from kobani in Syria
disabled from birth she cannot walk and
made the dangerous crossing from Turkey
last week but a child who taught herself
English by watching soap operas sees
this journey as a challenge to be met by
what you want in this world so yes it's
a journey for a new life I've been
trying many things for the first time
during this journey like a train and
then a ship so I just enjoyed it you
enjoyed it yeah you're the first person
I've met who said that but to understand
why you must know the world she escaped
from at any minute I can't imagine that
I read her movie
you've had to leave your parents people
in that must be difficult I can't sleep
without my mom so I'm missing her what
is your dream
I have to be an astronaut to go out to
sea
and find an alien yes so I wanna meet
the Queen because everyone just when I
talk about her and her life even this
news talking about her like she lives at
the end of the street and I want to
prove to anyone that dreams can really
come true
magine wants to reach her brother who's
in germany as rumors spread of a new
route through Croatia she set off by
taxi to that border three hours drive
away and the harvest fields it looked as
if a lost tribe was trying to find its
way a journey that's become an odyssey
now to Croatia and on to further borders
they hope will lead to Germany the
events in Hungary are pushing more and
more people along this road towards the
border with Croatia they're being told
at this end that they're welcome and
being offered safe passage something
very welcome in the current
circumstances for no gene the heart
track the dust are all part of the
journey to the normal life she believes
is somewhere ahead sometimes I dream of
living forever to never die not unless I
wanted to actually a dream I could just
know everything to have super
intelligence super strength for that
matter and super speed we hadn't seen
each other for 70 years
I didn't know I had a twin brother
all the years was lost and I kinda give
up hope in my heart I always had a
feeling that I did have a twin brother
and for 70 years I left with
I live with unknown things
